entry.title: New release for Openreads: v2.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

:rocket: Summary

  • Book format is shown in the books lists.
  • Added alert about searching covers in DuckDuckGo.
  • iOS UI improvements: frosted glass for AppBar, dialogs, switches, loading indicators.
  • Unified look of bottom sheets.
  • fix: New book screen respects "Read tab first" setting.
  • fix: Added localization for some missed strings.
  • fix: Removed issues with exporting in iOS.
  • translation: New languages: Basque, Malayalam, Nynorsk.

entry.title: New release for Openreads: v2.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

:rocket: Summary

  • fix: App will open when Nynorsk langauge is used.
  • fix: Cover editor will be displayed properly on Android 15.
  • fix: Cover can be loaded from device.
  • fix: Local backup/restore is fixed on Android.
  • fix: CSV is imported properly.
  • fix: Added removed card backgrounds.

:safety_vest: Contributions

  • ci: Changed append to release job's file location by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/631
  • fix: Fixed Nynorska language by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/632
  • fix: Changed context passed to image cropper. by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/639
  • 634 bug top most buttons in edit cover feature cannot be selected by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/640
  • Feat/UI improvements by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/642
  • build: Upgraded Flutter to 3.27.4 by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/643
  • 637 bug cannot create a local backup by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/644
  • Cicd/updates by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/645
  • feat: Unified look of cards by @mateusz-bak in https://github.com/mateusz-bak/openreads/pull/646
